name: Word Search World 2.0
description:
Search and find all the hidden words, complete cool challenges in the grid.

Do you like word search games? You'll be impressed with our free word brain game! Find more than 1000 words by solving category based puzzle. Slide your finger over them and get all 5 stars for finding 10 words in 12 categories! You'll need to solve the easy levels first to unlock the tougher ones. Tough levels are challenging!
Spend countless hours with these brain twisting word puzzles! It's perfect with your daily cup of coffee. All levels are solvable!

Features:
- Find more than 1000 words by solving 1000+ word seek puzzles
- Find crazy words in multiple categories
- Words can be vertical, horizontal, diagonal and even backwards.
- ALL levels are free. No inapp product offers to purchase coins etc.
- Innovative breakfast and newspaper theme interface works wonderfully well on all iPhones and iPads.
- Challenge mode with 12 cool challenges (shadow modes, hidden words, blind brain mode and more challenging puzzles etc.)
- Quick play mode with 3 difficulty levels and On/Off timer

Become a true word genius now!
